body_html:
@anilkumar1589 Pls try the patch above in my earlier comment to point to whereever your nsync.a is. My patch is for OSX. You dont need Bazel when using the Makefile.

For iOS / OSX this should no longer be an issue since we explicitly pass the location of the nsync.a location to the compile scripts.

@anilkumar1589 Pls try the patch above in my earlier comment to point to whereever your nsync.a is. My patch is for OSX.  You dont need Bazel when using the Makefile. 

For iOS / OSX this should no longer be an issue since we explicitly pass the location of the nsync.a location to the compile scripts.
